meanings.definition: having or showing trust or confidence
meanings.sent1: She gave him a trustful smile, indicating her belief in his abilities.
meanings.sent2: The trustful employee never doubted that his hard work would be recognized.
meanings.sent3: The trustful student eagerly raised her hand, confident in her answer.
meanings.sent4: His trustful tone reassured her that everything would be okay.
meanings.sent5: The trustful expression on his face made her feel secure in their partnership.
